publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3059# Miss Annabel Goldie: Economic Regeneration of Braehead—That the Parliament notes the economic regeneration emanating from Braehead in the west of Scotland; welcomes the creation of new jobs there, and further notes the related opportunity for the positive development of the maritime potential of the Clyde.

S1M-3059# Miss Annabel Goldie: Economic Regeneration of Braehead—That the Parliament notes the economic regeneration emanating from Braehead in the west of Scotland; welcomes the creation of new jobs there, and further notes the related opportunity for the positive development of the maritime potential of the Clyde.
S1M-3059# Economic Regeneration of Braehead (lodged on 1 May 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-3059# Economic Regeneration of Braehead (lodged on 1 May 2002) Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-3059# Economic Regeneration of Braehead (lodged on 1 May 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-3059# Economic Regeneration of Braehead (lodged on 1 May 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
